title: Soul of the Forgotten
description: Liane, a Reeka warrior, has been imprisoned for eleven years. But the Reeka warriors were pardoned nine years before. She was simply...forgotten. Lost in a system that didnt care, her sanity slipping away day by day.Discovered by bounty hunters, and taken from the prison planet by Daamen traders, Liane has to learn to live again. The Daamens are happy to teach her and one trader in particular, Borga.But someone from her past wants her dead, and theyll go to any lengths to see it happen. Treachery, murder, and greed...and the key to it all...the Forgotten Warrior.
author: Angela Verdenius
